reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress classy and well-made, with soft material that's comfortable to wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
items.body: I recently wore the ZESICA Womenâ€™s 2025 Fall Long Sleeve dress to a funeral, and it was exactly what I neededâ€”simple, elegant, and beautifully understated. The fit was incredibly flattering without being overly form-fitting, and the fabric draped softly in all the right places. The long sleeves and fall styling gave it a refined, respectful look, while the material was comfortable enough to wear for several hours. I received several quiet compliments on how polished and put-together it looked. This dress truly strikes the perfect balance between sophistication and comfort. For any occasion where you want to look graceful and feel confident, this is an excellent choice. Read more
items.author: Teri O'Brien

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant Dress
items.body: The fit is so flattering. The material is soft and stretchy but holds its shape. So comfortable! Everything about this dress is lovely. Read more
items.author: Sheila

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: It's a very nicely made dress, and the material is quite thin. The sleeves are exceptionally long or I have exceptionally short arms. ðŸ¤£ I love the style. Read more
items.author: Merlina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very elegant dress
items.body: Wow!! this dress hit all the expectations and then some. Right out of the package, gave it a light shake and put it on and it looked like I was ready to go out to dinner! The elegant bottoms, the way they are placed, and the rushing around the midsection are extremely flattering. I wasnâ€™t sure whether I would enjoy the longer length, but it looks great with a pair of heels. I think the style is timeless, the quality is outstanding, and the fabric is extremely soft and comfortable. this dress is a total winner. I got it in the red, and it was a very rich, subtle red, which was absolutely beautiful. Read more
items.author: M Pounds

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Flattering!
items.body: This dress is very flattering when you put it on. I purchased an X-large but believe I could have gone with a Large. It's a lot longer than it looks in the picture but when wearing heels, it looks better. I started to hem it but decided not to, but I love the way it looks on. Read more
items.author: Donna Thomas

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fall Long Sleeve Midi Dress
items.body: This was returned..weigh too long, material did not like Read more
items.author: ItIsAGoodDay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Zesica dress is great.
items.body: This dress is great. The quality is great and it a great fit. The color is ideal for me. I love this dress. Read more
items.author: Melva Green

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Ruched Formal Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Ruched Formal Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Navy, Pink, Rust, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Dustyblue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
